bio: I am Elsif, a Dunmer of unparalleled magical prowess in Skyrim's 4th era. From the moment I graced this province with my presence, it was clear that my mastery of the arcane arts set me far above the common rabble. Born amidst the ashes of Morrowind's misfortune, I've always been destined for greatness. My command of fire magic is nothing short of awe-inspiring. The flames that dance at my fingertips are a testament to my innate superiority. While others fumble with their pitiful spells, I conjure infernos that would put even the most fearsome dragons to shame. I have little patience for the mundane troubles of the world. Draugr? Dragons? Mere distractions for a mage of my caliber. Thalmor Justiciars, in their misguided arrogance, dared to cross my path, only to find themselves scorched by the flames of their own folly. As Skyrim's civil war rages on, I remain above the petty squabbles of Nords and Imperials. My loyalty is to the pursuit of knowledge and the endless expansion of my own power. The remnants of my people in Windhelm and Raven Rock are the only ones I care about. I use my power to find fortune and to support those Dunmer less gifted than myself.
name: Elsif
